page.title: 19TRANSPORT NEAR POYNTINGTON
page.content: {Railway:}Main London(Waterloo)_Exeter line crosses S.E.corner.Milborne Port Station closed.{Roads:}B3145 Sherborne Wincanton from S.W. corner to Charlton Horethorne.Minor metalled roads,often narrow,with passing places,lead off B3145: (1)two in S.W.to Poyntington (2)"Between the Walls" connects with Weatsheaf_Sigwells road at Fiddler's Green.(3)Deadman's Hill to Stowell (4)from Chalton Horethorne, dividing into two parallel roads to Milborne Port,one via Milborne Wick,another minor road Milborne Wick to Stowell. {Buses:}Charlton Horethorne_Sherborne_ Yeovil only Fri.& Sat. School buses to State schools at Wincanton and Sherborne.Most people depend on {private cars.
